attributes.action: ignore the petition to maintain the British Army's tradition of the bearskin hat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the 21st century this hat and the uniform belongs exclusively to a fancy dress party. Soldiers strutting around in a bearskin hat is just escapism for tourists and armchair generals who grew up playing with napoleonic war toy soldiers and reminisce about the 'good old days' of empire. I suggest soldiers would prioritise equipment to keep them alive such as body armour rather than the skinning of bears for vanity.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions on petitions.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
